channel.title: Roles View :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Roles View To start this project, let’s add a new view and a new component to explore the roles available in our application. First, let’s create a simple component skeleton in a new src/components/roles/ folder. We’ll name it the RolesList component: <script setup> /** * @file Roles List Component * @author Russell Feldhausen <russfeld@ksu.edu> */ // Import Libraries import { ref } from 'vue' import { api } from '@/configs/api' import { Card } from 'primevue' // Create Reactive State const roles = ref([]) // Load Roles api .
